document.full_text: bp's  planned $18 billion tie-up with russia's rosneft  was looking even more uncertain after chief backer igor sechin stood down as rosneft chairman, and sources said bp faced a new legal challenge.
document.title: bp's rosneft deal more uncertain after sechin quits
lines_and_colors: bp's  planned $18 billion tie-up with russia's rosneft  was looking even more uncertain after chief backer igor sechin stood down as rosneft chairman, and sources said bp faced a new legal challenge.
